lead_paragraph: The officer escaped with the militants in the second insider attack on the police in the southern province of Oruzgan in less than two weeks, an official said.

byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah reported from Kandahar, and Mujib Mashal from Kabul, Afghanistan.
byline.original: By TAIMOOR SHAH and MUJIB MASHAL

headline.print_headline: 10 Police Officers in Afghanistan Are Poisoned and Shot in an Insider Attack
headline.main: Afghan Police Officer Suspected of Helping Taliban Kill 10 Comrades

snippet: The officer escaped with the militants in the second insider attack on the police in the southern province of Oruzgan in less than two weeks, an official said.
abstract: Ten Afghan police officers are poisoned by colleague and shot in head by Taliban fighters he was working with.
